chunks.raw_text: Service: Frequently Asked Questions Category: FAQs Common questions and answers about NWSC services Q: How do I get a new connection to my premises? A: Navigate to New connection followed by Apply Now and fill out required details in the form. Q: How do i get a meter separation? A: Reach out to your respective relationship manager, they will guide accordingly. Q: how much does it cost to get connected?
